name: Play with BUGS
description:
control schemes is written here because we did not have time to add it :)

move :  AD  or -> <-

single attack : R 

multiple attack: Q 

dodge : G 

Dash : F 

jump : space 

air attack: R + space

fake death: B 

have fun :). 

PS. The game is very buggy hence the name "Play with Bugs :)"
